phrs.translation: 钪, 钪棒, 氧化钪, 供应氧化钪
氧化钪, 钪氧, 供应氧化钪, 氧化
三氟甲烷磺酸钪, 三氟甲磺酸钪, 三氟甲基磺酸钪
氟化钪, 无水氟化钪

sentences.sentence: With scandium and yttrium, they make up the rare earth metals.
sentences.translation: 加上钪和钇，一起组成稀土金属。

sentences.sentence: Scandium-modified Al alloys are a new kind of high performance alloys.
sentences.translation: 钪改性的铝合金是一类高性能新型铝合金。

sentences.sentence: They turned out to be the undiscovered elements scandium, gallium, technetium and germanium.
sentences.translation: 那时还没发现的元素就是钪，镓，锗和锝。
